headline.main: RUSSIAN ASSASSIN KILLS H.H. EMERICH; American Metallurgist Shot Through Window in Kyshtim Leaves Widow and Babes.

docs.abstract: Emerich, Horace H: Amer mgr of factory in Kyshtim, Russia; killed by unknown assailant; US State Dept demands probe and protection for his family
